txt_en: In costumes, we find the courage to be bolder than we are.
txt_cn: 戏服之下，藏着我们敢闯敢试的勇气。

txt_en: Love grows when shared, not when hidden away.
txt_cn: 爱不藏于暗处，分享方得生长。

txt_en: Progress beats perfection every time.
txt_cn: 进步永远胜过完美。

txt_en: Kindness costs nothing, but means everything.
txt_cn: 善意零成本，却价值千金。

txt_en: Be brave, even when your heart beats fast.
txt_cn: 心跳再快，也别丢了勇气。

txt_en: As we listen to others with care, we create bonds that make life feel warmer.
txt_cn: 用心倾听他人，能编织出温暖生活的情感纽带。

txt_en: Forgiveness frees more than the forgiven.
txt_cn: 宽恕解脱的，不止是被宽恕者。

txt_en: As we stay curious about the world, we keep our minds young and open.
txt_cn: 怀着对世界的好奇，思维便会保持年轻与开阔。

txt_en: It takes a strong man to save himself, and a great man to save another.
txt_cn: 强者自救，圣者渡人。

txt_en: I have loved the stars too fondly to be fearful of the night.
txt_cn: 我如此挚爱星辰，便不再畏惧黑夜的降临。

txt_en: Any mind that is capable of a real sorrow is capable of good.
txt_cn: 能感受真切悲伤的人，必也心存善念。

txt_en: Don't count the days, make the days count.
txt_cn: 不要虚度光阴，要让每一天都有价值。

txt_en: The closer they look, the less they actually see.
txt_cn: 他们离得越近，实际看到的就越少。

txt_en: When we celebrate others' success, we open our hearts to more happiness.
txt_cn: 为他人的成功喝彩，自己也会收获更多幸福。

txt_en: Trust is built when someone is vulnerable and not taken advantage of.
txt_cn: 当人展露脆弱却不被利用时，信任便会悄然建立。

txt_en: No need to be anybody but oneself.
txt_cn: 不必成为任何人，做自己就足矣。

txt_en: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift.
txt_cn: 过去已尘封，明日仍未知，此刻最珍贵。

txt_en: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls.
txt_cn: 最坚韧的灵魂，往往在苦难中淬炼而成。

txt_en: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
txt_cn: 人生若非一场勇敢的冒险，终将寂灭于无物。

txt_en: Imperfection is not a flaw, but a part of what makes us human.
txt_cn: 不完美并非缺陷，而是构成人性的一部分。

txt_en: To live simply is to free the heart from clutter and cherish what truly matters.
txt_cn: 生活简朴，方能卸下杂念，拥抱真正有价值的一切。

txt_en: A man can be destroyed, but not defeated.
txt_cn: 躯体可被摧毁，意志永不言败。

txt_en: When we stay true to our values, we never lose our way in life.
txt_cn: 忠于自己的原则，人生便不会迷失方向。

txt_en: I must take risks, for otherwise I will never change or grow.
txt_cn: 必须勇于尝试，否则永远无法改变或成长。

txt_en: In uncertainty, courage is the compass home.
txt_cn: 迷茫之时，勇气是照亮归途的指南针。
